tr.td: No significant alignment: Shorter contiguous hit (20 bp) than the longest contiguous hit in a random sequence of the same length and GC content (23 bp)
No significant alignment: With an average exon size of 123 bases (Scherer and Basso, 2008), unlike cenRNA#1 transcription from short exons separated by long introns
extended higher-order repeats from chromosome X from (Miga et al., 2014)
hg38 reference assembly, incorporating several megabases of new centromeric assembly
α-satellite monomers and novel repeating centromeric elements from (Lacoste et al., 2014)
α-satellite monomers and novel repeating centromeric elements from (Henikoff et al., 2015)
HeLa genome (Adey et al., 2013; Landry et al., 2013)
